title: Medicare Error - 9635
body:
When does this error appear?
This error may appear when attempting to create a new Bulk Bill, DVA ECLIPSE or Patient Claim.
What does this error mean?
This error indicates that the provider isn't properly registered with Medicare to submit this claim, as of the item's service date 
How do I resolve this error?
Confirm that the service date is correct, for all items you are attempting to claim. If this is correct, please ensure the provider has filled out a HW052 Banking details online claiming form, or if you are unsure, contact the Medicare eBusiness centre:
Phone: 1800 700 199 Monday to Friday, 8 am to 5 pm local time
Fax: 03 9605 7981
Email: ebusiness@servicesaustralia.gov.au.
  For more information about claiming, please see our article about Medicare Claiming
